titleStmt.title: The remonstrance or declaration of vs, the inhabitants of the county palatine of Chester, whose names are subscribed, and of many more.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by L.N. and J.F. for E. Husbands and J. Franck, and are to be sold at their shops in the Middle-Temple, and the next door to the Kings-head in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of the originals in the Bodleian Library (Early English books), and the British Library (Thomason Tracts).

place.placeName: door to the Kings-head in Fleetstreet
